languages.text: Whenever the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g} character also suffers {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (3). Burning effects inflicted by the wearer have their level increased by +{uip|Damage|d37c749a078b4629aea1a924c594c19d}.

Burning effects inflicted by the wearer have their level increased by +{uip|Damage|d37c749a078b4629aea1a924c594c19d}.

Burning effects inflicted by the wearer have their level increased by +{uip|Damage|d37c749a078b4629aea1a924c594c19d}.

Burning effects inflicted by the wearer have their level increased by +{uip|Damage|d37c749a078b4629aea1a924c594c19d}.

languages.text: 每当装备者造成{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}亚空间伤害{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}{/g}时，还会对目标施加{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}（3）效果。此外，装备者造成的所有燃烧效果等级都会提高{uip|Damage|d37c749a078b4629aea1a924c594c19d}级。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g} character also suffers {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (3). Burning effects inflicted by the wearer have their level increased by +{uip|Damage|d37c749a078b4629aea1a924c594c19d}.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者造成{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}亚空间伤害{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}{/g}时，还会对目标施加{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}（3）效果。此外，装备者造成的所有燃烧效果等级都会提高{uip|Damage|d37c749a078b4629aea1a924c594c19d}级。

每当装备者造成{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}亚空间伤害{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}{/g}时，还会对目标施加{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}（3）效果。此外，装备者造成的所有燃烧效果等级都会提高，加值等同于{uip|Damage|d37c749a078b4629aea1a924c594c19d}。

languages.text: Когда персонаж наносит {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урон{/g}, на цель также накладывается {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g} (3). Уровень накладываемых персонажем эффектов горения увеличивается на +{uip|Damage|d37c749a078b4629aea1a924c594c19d}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g} character also suffers {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (3). Burning effects inflicted by the wearer have their level increased by +{uip|Damage|d37c749a078b4629aea1a924c594c19d}.

traits.locale_text: Когда персонаж наносит варп-урон, на цель также накладывается горение (<u>истончение завесы</u>).
Когда персонаж наносит варп-урон, на цель также накладывается горение (<u>истончение завесы</u>).

Когда персонаж наносит {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урон{/g}, на цель также накладывается {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g} (3). Накладываемые персонажем эффекты горения усиливаются на +{uip|Damage|d37c749a078b4629aea1a924c594c19d}.

languages.text: 使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}歪みダメージ{/g}を与えるたびに、{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けたキャラクターは{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}(3)も受ける。使用者が与える炎上効果は、そのレベルが+{uip|Damage|d37c749a078b4629aea1a924c594c19d}増加する。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g} character also suffers {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (3). Burning effects inflicted by the wearer have their level increased by +{uip|Damage|d37c749a078b4629aea1a924c594c19d}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}ワープダメージ{/g}を与えるたびに、ダメージを受けたキャラクターも{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}（{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}<u>ヴェールの劣化</u>{/g}）を受ける。

使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}ワープダメージ{/g}を与えるたびに、{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージを受けた{/g}キャラクターは{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}効果も受ける(3)。使用者が与える炎上効果は+{uip|Damage|d37c749a078b4629aea1a924c594c19d}度に応じて威力が増加する。

languages.text: Cada vez que el portador cause {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}daño de disformidad{/g}, el personaje {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dañado{/g} también sufre un efecto de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} (3). Los efectos de quemadura aplicados por el portador aumentan de nivel en +{uip|Damage|d37c749a078b4629aea1a924c594c19d}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g} character also suffers {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (3). Burning effects inflicted by the wearer have their level increased by +{uip|Damage|d37c749a078b4629aea1a924c594c19d}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el portador cause {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}daño de disformidad{/g}, el personaje {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dañado{/g} también sufre un efecto de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} (3). Los efectos de quemadura aplicados por el portador aumentan de nivel en +{uip|Damage|d37c749a078b4629aea1a924c594c19d}.

Cada vez que el portador cause {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}daño de disformidad{/g}, el personaje {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dañado{/g} también sufre un efecto de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} (3). Los efectos de quemadura aplicados por el portador infligen daño adicional igual a la {uip|Damage|d37c749a078b4629aea1a924c594c19d}.

languages.text: Wenn der Träger {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warp-Schaden{/g} verursacht, erleidet der {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}geschädigte{/g} Charakter außerdem {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g} (3). Die Kraft der vom Träger bewirkten Verbrennungseffekte wird um +{uip|Damage|d37c749a078b4629aea1a924c594c19d} erhöht.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g} character also suffers {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (3). Burning effects inflicted by the wearer have their level increased by +{uip|Damage|d37c749a078b4629aea1a924c594c19d}.

traits.locale_text: Wann immer der Träger {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warp-Schaden{/g} zufügt, erleidet der geschädigte Charakter außerdem den {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g}. Vom Träger angewendete Verbrennungseffekte fügten zusätzlich {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}<u>Zerfall des Schleiers</u>{/g}-Schaden zu.

Immer wenn der Träger {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warp-Schaden{/g} zufügt, erleidet der {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}geschädigte{/g} Charakter außerdem {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g} (3). Die Kraft der vom Träger angewendeten Verbrennungseffekte wird um +{uip|Damage|d37c749a078b4629aea1a924c594c19d} erhöht.

languages.text: Lorsque l'utilisateur inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts du Warp{/g}, le personnage subissant les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} subit également l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} (3). Les effets Combustion infligés par l'utilisateur voient leur niveau augmenter de +{uip|Damage|d37c749a078b4629aea1a924c594c19d}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g} character also suffers {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (3). Burning effects inflicted by the wearer have their level increased by +{uip|Damage|d37c749a078b4629aea1a924c594c19d}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts warp{/g}, la cible subit également l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}<u>dégradation du voile</u>{/g}).

Lorsque l'utilisateur inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts du Warp{/g}, le personnage subissant les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} subit également l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} (3). Les effets Combustion infligés par l'utilisateur voient leur niveau augmenter de +{uip|Damage|d37c749a078b4629aea1a924c594c19d}.

Chaque fois que l'utilisateur inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts warp{/g} à un personnage, celui-ci subit également l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} (3). La puissance des effets Combustion appliqués par l'utilisateur augmente de +{uip|Damage|d37c749a078b4629aea1a924c594c19d}.

Lorsque l'utilisateur inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts du Warp{/g}, le personnage subissant les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} subit également l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} (3). Les effets Combustion infligés par l'utilisateur voient leur niveau augmenter de +{uip|Damage|d37c749a078b4629aea1a924c594c19d}.

languages.text: Takan kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}öteboyut hasarı{/g} verdiğinde {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} gören karakter ayrıca {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanma{/g} (3) etkisine de maruz kalır. Takan kişinin sebep olduğu yanma etkisinin seviyesi +{uip|Damage|d37c749a078b4629aea1a924c594c19d} kadar artar.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g} character also suffers {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (3). Burning effects inflicted by the wearer have their level increased by +{uip|Damage|d37c749a078b4629aea1a924c594c19d}.
